Articles.Content:
IN THE FORUM, NOT REAL LIFE.

So, yeah, I've seen few people that are from the 2011-2012 era.

I think I'm pretty old for the forum's standards, right?
..Wow.. three years.. that is remarkable. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Grats, I think.
There are still a few of us around from that time. I'm on my 3rd account though so it doesn't show. :/
I'll be three in a month.
What's that in Kerbal years?

> 
> IN THE FORUM, NOT REAL LIFE.
> So, yeah, I've seen few people that are from the 2011-2012 era.
> 
> I think I'm pretty old for the forum's standards, right?

Just as well, as under 13's are not allowed to post without parental or guardian consent ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
You young whippersnappers need do get off my lawn! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

So am I! I still remember waiting for 0.16 like a happy child on Christmas Eve. Good times.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-06T17:39:39Z" title="08/06/2015 05:39  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 6, 2015</time> by Felsmak**

> 
> Just as well, as under 13's are not allowed to post without parental or guardian consent ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Heh, I wonder if folks under 13 would be interested in KSP.

Anyway, I'm also proud to be a part of the Veteran/3 Year club.
As an under 13 I was interested in it.

> 
> Just as well, as under 13's are not allowed to post without parental or guardian consent ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

By under 13's you mean 2013, right? RIGHT?!?
I got the game 1 and a quarter years ago. I joined this forum 9 and a half months ago.

> 
> Just as well, as under 13's are not allowed to post without parental or guardian consent ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

 Dosen't mean they can't fake it... not suggesting anything.... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) This account was created in the same time as you gmpd, but my actual account used to be this:
[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/24064-sss](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/24064-sss)

Don't remember what happened, but I came straight out of the MC forum back then. I feel kinda old by forum standards, but I know there's more vetrans here.

Side note, yes I did create the original google picture war. If you want proof, PM me anything.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-07T06:19:09Z" title="08/07/2015 06:19  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 7, 2015</time> by The Destroyer**

hehe ; ) tree years old are often some nice roots to begin with ; ) anyway i do must agree just

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VZKMaFR2mtU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 or

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gy8HPSIFXEM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 @ destroyer & W xDr one should fit anyway happy forum birthday GMPD2k ; )

> 
> Heh, I wonder if folks under 13 would be interested in KSP.
> Anyway, I'm also proud to be a part of the Veteran/3 Year club.

I've taught small kids (both boys and girls) to play KSP successfully. Never underestimate the intelligence of young padawans ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> IN THE FORUM, NOT REAL LIFE.
> So, yeah, I've seen few people that are from the 2011-2012 era.
> 
> I think I'm pretty old for the forum's standards, right?

I'm just about the same age. Crap. I just realized I forgot to celebrate my purchase of KSP with some special mission in 0.16 or something.

> 
> Heh, I wonder if folks under 13 would be interested in KSP.
> Anyway, I'm also proud to be a part of the Veteran/3 Year club.

As i was 13 and a half when I bought KSP i would say no as i could see the state of 13 yr olds in my school. However KSP is a game Ive been wqnting since i was 5 and playing Trainz Simulator 2006 on my Grandads PC.

Should we make a First-Week-Of-August-2012 group in the forum?

Because we have almost the same forum birthday!

I had actually just turned 13 a few months before I got into KSP (around version .19). So I know for a fact that someone that age can enjoy this game. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

As for my forum age ,I actually lurked here for 2 years before making an account.![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

> 
> I've taught small kids (both boys and girls) to play KSP successfully. Never underestimate the intelligence of young padawans ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I think I was 11 when I started KSP, from the freeAllegiance forums.
Huh, this just reminded me,that i'm coming up on my first anniversary of joining!

Looks like I'm getting close to the 3 year point (just a couple more months), though I had been playing since March of that year (2012). I remember getting so excited simply when persistence was introduced.
Let's see, I joined on February 22nd, it's the 9th today, About almost half a year!
Years? I go by update release dates. I started in .23.5, and joined in .90.
